tool_description:
IT Interview Automation APIs is a set of APIs developoed by Zackriya Solutions, now in Beta
- By Zackriya.com
name: Interview Automation
title: Interview Automation

api_list.name: root__get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://interview-automation.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "interview-automation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: show_token_v1_quickstart_auth_get
api_list.description:
This endpoint is used for quickstart authentication.
Here, we are using the firebase auth token to authenticate the user.
To get the firebase auth token, we need to login to the firebase console and get the token.
This function shall return an html page with the simple login button, once clicked shall redirect
to the firebase login page. Once the user is authenticated, the firebase auth token shall be
displayed on the page. Copy the token and use it in the swagger UI to test the API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://interview-automation.p.rapidapi.com/v1/quickstart_auth"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "interview-automation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
